text:
Methods for exiting investments in portfolio companies include trade sale (sell to
a competitor or another strategic buyer); IPO (sell some or all shares to investors);
recapitalization (issue portfolio company debt); secondary sale (sell to another private
equity firm or other investors); or write-off/liquidation.
Private equity has some historical record of potential diversification benefits. An investor
must identify top performing private equity managers to benefit from private equity.
